data.title: Come and visit the real-life Sapporo filming locations of the internationally renowned Netflix drama, First Love!
data.meta_description: The official travel information website for Sapporo | Discover the capital of Hokkaido, Japan. This city surrounded by majestic nature is home to world-class powder snow, diverse cuisine, abundant shopping, and unique cultural experiences.
data.meta_site_name: Visit Sapporo : The Official Travel Guide to Sightseeing in Sapporo
data.text:
First Love is a Japanese drama released on Netflix in 2022. Set in Hokkaido, the series is beloved by many people, both in Japan and internationally.

So, if you are planning a trip to Sapporo, why not make a visit to the First Love filming locations? You can find each filming spot on the map and Visit Sapporo has also made a video introducing some of the key central locations. Make the journey to world of some of the dramaâ€™s iconic scenes, while fondly reminiscing about the story of Yae and Harumichi.
